title: Will I get grace marks if I‘m only short of 1 or 2 marks in one subject and passed in all other subjects? - Quora

response.answer_text: YES… they don’t say it officially, but consider its a subject like physics or chemistry or something out of a 70 in a theory paper, then you need 23 to pass. In case a student scores somewhat like an 18 or 20 , the best efforts are made to increase it to the passing limit ! So don’t worry and pepare well for coming exams… Sulking over previous papers won’t do much ! Good luck ^__^
